term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - column volume, Vc, in chromatography
term.title: column volume

item.text: The geometric volume of the part of the tube that contains the packing: Vc = AcL is the internal cross-sectional area of the tube and L the length of the packed part of the column. In the case of wall-coated open-tubular columns the column volume corresponds to the geometric volume of the whole tube having a liquid or a solid stationary phase on its wall.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 832 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
